A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Why does Yoda talk so much?? Why would Luke be so angry\, as if he hasn't mastered the Buddhist-like Zen of all the other Jedi masters before him?? Why is the movie so Marvel-esque quippy?? Since when in the hell was Star Wars quippy?? Was it better than Force Awakens? Yes. But is that saying much? No.
